Roc Tien stars as Xiao Feng, the most lethal killer in all of China. His fame and notoriety are known throughout the land. Countless swordsmen and martial arts experts come to test his blade, but the only thing Xiao Feng wants is to live a quiet life with his girlfriend. This proves to be impossible when his past catches up with him and reveals a horrid secret.

With its fast-paced swordplay action sequences and lavish period-piece production design, the Taiwanese film LOVE AND SWORD is one of the forgotten and rarely seen classics of old-school kung-fu cinema.
 Directed by Lee Chia, the hardhitting epic stars Roc Tien as a renowned fighter forced out of retirement by a dark secret from his past.
